Fixed released to HEAD. It was not correct to load a participant if not 
already loaded when saving state.

I had some problems when testing this. My first test was:

1) Create a merge subscriber.
2) Quit Eclipse and restart
3) All saved subscribers were instantiated on startup during sync view 
initialization so I could not verify this way (is this expected?)

My second test was:

1) Create a merge subscriber
2) Close all sync views
3) Quit and restart
4) Quit and restart
5) Open the sync view. There was no merge subscriber in the sync view.

Ok, good catch. Instead we should persist the last saved state for
un-initialized participants. Fix released to HEAD.
